Player list 
ALMADEN SWIM AND RACQUET CLUB
151 teams have gone on to a league championship event since 1998!

For questions concerning leagues, please click here League Coordinator.
For more information about member organizations, contact USTA Northern California at 510-748-7373 or playerservices@norcal.usta.com.

6604 NORTHRIDGE DR
SAN JOSE, CA 95120
County: Santa Clara
Phone: 408-268-9555

E-Mail: club@asrc.org

General information:

Directions:
From Hwy 85 or Hwy 87, take the Almaden Expressway exit (from Hwy 85, at this point, you are about 5 minutes from ASRC). Take Almaden Expressway south to Camden. Turn right on Camden and go one block to Trinidad. Turn left on Trinidad and proceed five short blocks to Crown Blvd. Turn right on Crown Blvd. and the club is on the right hand side. The club is in the middle of a residential neighborhood across the street from the Almaden Golf & Country Club.
